title: Players a ban of seven days or more from 8/22/2017 are ineligible for this year’s rewards this true
body:
Players a ban of seven days or more from 8/22/2017 are ineligible for this year’s rewards this true ! 
yes or no

replies.body: True!  We posted this on our [Ranked Eligibility FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility), but a ban of seven days or more from 8/22/2017 are ineligible for this season's rewards.

wow thats awesome never got banned before and now I got banned for my first time in 3 or 4 years and now I won't get any rewards ?????? 700 ranked games for nothing this year well played riot well played.. and nice that we got to know that at the end of the season that makes It only worse
